details: Developed and launched a new feature on a banking application, resulting in an 80% increase in new account registrations and substantial funds generation.
Implemented architectural improvements (MVVM-C pattern, Swift injection) for improved code quality and stability.
Optimized application performance and responsiveness, resulting in a 20% decrease in app loading time and higher user satisfaction ratings.
Streamlined development processes by introducing CI/CD pipelines, reducing time-to-market by 25% and improving overall efficiency.
Implemented effective monitoring and issue resolution practices, maintaining optimal application health for uninterrupted user experiences.
Collaborated closely with cross-functional teams to deliver weekly feature updates, driving a 15% increase in user engagement and retention rates.
Integrated groundbreaking AI Companion Support into the baby2body App.
Utilized CI/CD tools like Git, Github, Bitbucket, Jenkins, and Fastlane for efficient feature releases.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver weekly features, increasing user engagement by 20%.
Improved app performance, leading to a 15% increase in app ratings and a 25% decrease in crash incidents.
Conducted periodic code reviews and refactoring sessions to improve the maintainability and scalability of the front-end architecture.
Defined requirements for new features and enhancements, following best practices in user experience design and front-end development.
Implemented interactive elements and integration with third-party services as required.
Oversaw the testing phase for new features, including unit testing, integration testing, and acceptance testing.
Served as the primary contact for front-end related incidents and bugs, prioritizing issues based on severity.
Developed and maintained an efficient system for tracking, reporting, and resolving issues in a timely manner.
Provided technical support to other team members and stakeholders, offering guidance and assistance to proactively identify and address potential issues before they affect users.
Maintained up-to-date documentation on application setup, configuration, and routine maintenance procedures to assist with knowledge sharing and onboarding new team members.

Education.detail: I am a computer science graduate from the University of Lagos, class of 2018. Starting in 2012, I built a strong foundation in software development, data structures, and algorithms. During my studies, I participated in hackathons, winning top positions, and developed a keen interest in AI and machine learning. My internship at a leading tech firm allowed me to contribute to innovative real-world solutions. Passionate about technology, I continue to enhance my skills through coding challenges and open-source projects. I am dedicated to mentoring younger STEM students and am focused on advancing my career in the tech industry.
